subject: Testosterone
Bicycles and Bicycling
Steroids
Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
lead_paragraph: Floyd Landis is asking people to stretch their inner oath of fairness, now blaming a Jack Daniel's binge for his A sample spike a night before  Stage 17.
